'''Minecraft: Construction Handbook''' is a guide that contains various building tutorials and images of community builds. Most of the tutorials are followed by more advanced community builds, with at least one of them being by [[FyreUK]], with the exception of the roller coasters.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|'''There's nothing that can't be built in Minecraft, but with so many possibilities, where do you start? And how will you ever match the creative flair of the experts?'''<br><br>The official Minecraft Construction Handbook is packed with tips and step-by-step instructions from master building team FyreUK. You'll learn how to construct houses, bridges, ships, floating islands, and roller coasters that will amaze other players.<br><br>Plus, check out some of the most awe-inspiring community builds to fuel your own creative genius. You'll be a master builder in no time!|Original description}}
